snippet: The Kings were the better team, but beating the Rangers and dropping out of society for the length of four playoff series were rewards in themselves.
abstract: Charles McGrath On Hockey column asserts that the Stanley Cup finals between the Los Angeles Kings and the New Jersey Devils were draining to watch; says that the playoffs go on too long, sometimes feeling like a war of attrition.
lead_paragraph: The Kings were the better team, but beating the Rangers and dropping out of society for the length of four playoff series were rewards in themselves.

headline.seo: The Honest Devils Fan Knows the Truth - Charles McGrath
headline.main: What a Devils Fan Has to Admit
headline.print_headline: What a Devils Fan Has to Admit
